step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AU_ADAS_MARK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.MARK_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_ADAS_MARK P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AU_ADAS_GPSTRACK (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GPSTRACK_ID FROM TMAU_EXP_AU_ADAS_GPSTRACK P WHERE P.BATCH_ID [batch]);
SELECT P.* FROM AU_ADAS_MARK P, TEMP_AU_ADAS_MARK T WHERE P.MARK_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_ADAS_GPSRECORD P, TEMP_AU_ADAS_MARK T WHERE P.MARK_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM AU_ADAS_GPSTRACK P, TEMP_AU_ADAS_GPSTRACK T WHERE P.GPSTRACK_ID=T.PID;
